welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bottesford, the charming village nestled in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience the beauty of our town. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humaita Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport handles all commercial flights and provides a variety of services for travelers.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is used for military operations and is not open to the public.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free after completing a short registration process.
